POM_XIFU.title: Synthesis of Na10[Cu2Mo6O24]·nH2O
steps: Dissolve Cu(NO3)2·3H2O in 10 mL deionised water.
Adjust pH to 8.5 using 1 M NaOH.
Heat the solution to 90 °C and reflux for 4 h.
Cool to room temperature, filter, and slowly evaporate at 40 °C.
Blue block crystals suitable for X-ray diffraction appear after 3 days.
